title: Her Story
paragraphs: Looney arrived in 2024 with big ears, bigger paws, and an immediate sense that the couch belonged to her. She grew into a steady presence always by the door, always by her side, always ready for one more walk before dinner.

She loved belly rubs, forceful selfies, and long afternoons in the yard when the sun slid across the grass. Her favorite game was “find the beji,” and her favorite people were whoever was standing closest to the snack drawer.
